Auth Server Use Case: Joining a game

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Contents

  • 1 Precondition
  • 2 Main Flow
  • 3 Alternative Flows
    • 3.1 Game Server refuses
    • 3.2 Invalid session id
  • 4 Network Messages
    • 4.1 Main Flow
  • 5 Test Cases
    • 5.1 Client joins game
    • 5.2 Invalid session id

Precondition

  • Client must be logged in.

Main Flow

  1. Client sends a join request to the auth server
  2. Auth server sends a join request with the user name to the game server
  3. Game server sends a join response with a session id to the auth server
  4. Auth server sends a join response with a session id to the client
  5. Client sends a join request with user name and session id to the game server
  6. Game server sends a join response to the client
  7. Game server sends a player count update to the auth server

Alternative Flows

Game Server refuses

  1. Client sends a join request to the auth server
  2. Auth server sends a join request with the user name to the game server
  3. Game server sends a negative join response without a session id to the auth server
  4. Auth server sends a negative join response without a session id to the client

Invalid session id

  1. Client sends a join request to the auth server
  2. Auth server sends a join request with the user name to the game server
  3. Game server sends a join response with a session id to the auth server
  4. Auth server sends a join response with a session id to the client
  5. Client sends a join request with user name and session id to the game server
  6. Game server sends a negative join response to the client

Network Messages

Main Flow

  • Step 1: ClientJoinRequestMessage
  • Step 2: ClientJoinRequestMessage
  • Step 3: ClientJoinResponseMessage
  • Step 4: ClientJoinResponseMessage
  • Step 5: ClientJoinRequestMessage
  • Step 6: ClientJoinResponseMessage
  • Step 7: GameServerStatusUpdateMessage

Test Cases

Client joins game

Game server accepts session and client sends right session id.

Expected result
Client successfully joins the game

Invalid session id

Client sends a wrong session id to the game server

Expected result
Game server sends a negative join response to the client
Category: Auth Server Design
